programmes.show_description: Teleshopping.
Reality adventure series hosted by Ben Shephard. An exhausting snow hike tests the remaining climbers as former Gladiator-turned-reverend Warren faces a moral dilemma.
Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.
The celebrities are cast out to sea, Lucy has a moving encounter with the endangered great hammerhead shark, and Lenny opens up to Ade about his motives for being here.

Lib Dem leader Ed Davey and Education Secretary Bridget Phillipson join Ed and Susanna to discuss the fallout following Lord Mandelson's arrest and actress Joanna Page reveals the secrets to a happy marriage.
Gisèle Pelicot was at the centre of the biggest rape trial in French history, and later around the world. She joins us for an exclusive interview.
Martin Lewis is answering your money matters, design guru Kelly Hoppen is helping with all your home interior dilemmas, and Dragon's Den star Jenna Meek is on the sofa.
Join the Loose Women panellists as they interview celebrity guests and discuss the day's most topical issues, from current affairs to celebrity gossip and the latest showbiz news.
The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.
The latest news and weather from around the North West.
David Dickinson is in Cirencester in Gloucestershire as a collection of jewellery helps pay for a trip to America and a surprise model sports a vintage dressing gown.
Ranvir Singh hosts the rapid-fire quiz as contestants Richard and Elliot, Chantal and Isabelle, and Saul and Akash take on Riddlemaster Henry Lewis in a bid to solve his riddles.
Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

Charles from Basildon, Ruth from Leeds, Pam from Nottingham and Aidan from Coventry work together as a team to face one of the country's finest quiz brains - watch as Bradley Walsh hosts and they try to take a Chaser down for thousands of pounds.
The latest news and weather from around the North West.
National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world, plus a focus on the stories that matter to you.

programmes.show_name: New: The Martin Lewis Money Show Live
programmes.show_description: Martin equips us with the crucial information well need ahead of an imminent energy price cap announcement and questions the chief executive of energy regulator Ofgem.
Kim convinces Joe to test Graham's loyalty, a farm emergency worries Cain, and there is a euphoric kiss.
Jodie is tracked down by a stranger, Bernie threatens to report Mal for breaking in, Maggie reminds Lauren who calls the shots, and Steve feels reluctant to visit his dad in hospital.
A dramatic twist sees one member of the group be forced to make a heartbreaking decision by the Mountain's Keeper.
ITV News provides a fresh perspective on the major stories of the day with national and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents.
The latest news and weather from around the North West.
It's a baptism of fire for the new chefs as they hit the ground running and try to stay focused on a first service while having fun flirting.

Teleshopping.
Dermot travels south to the coastal enclave of Kinsale, which is known as the gourmet capital of Ireland, to learn about seaweed and go foraging for wild garlic.
Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.
Jeremy invites best friend and chef Simon Rimmer on a trip down memory lane as he shows him the sights of his old family holidays and tastes of nostalgia.
News, current affairs and lively debate.
Lorraine Kelly presents a topical mix of entertainment, discussion and showbiz glamour as well as the latest fashion, food and celebrity gossip.
Ruby Wax takes a look back at some of her most iconic celebrity interviews, and Queen Of Soaps Sharon Marshall speaks to us from Coronation Street.
Join the Loose Women panellists as they interview celebrity guests and discuss the day's most topical issues, from current affairs to celebrity gossip and the latest showbiz news.
The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

Sellers in Solihull hope that David Dickinson and his team will pay the real deal for a vintage political poster, a collection of silver, and a battered old violin.
Ranvir Singh hosts the rapid and ruthless quiz as contestants Steve and Jo, Mordecai and Sam, and Chloe and Beth take on Riddlemaster Henry Lewis in a bid to solve his riddles.

Bradley Walsh hosts as four strangers - Dianne from Newcastle, Stephen from Essex, Adrian from Cockermouth and Meli from Berkshire - work together in the hope that they can take on a Chaser as a team and leave with thousands of pounds.

Ray’s burial causes concern, Vinny fears for his love life, and Kim orders Graham to leave.
Bernie tells Kit about Mal’s stalking, Shona mislays her wedding ring, Ben takes Tim and Steve on an outing, and Christina and Adam cause headaches for George.
The first episode of the thrilling drama series based on Alex Dahl's best-selling novel of the same name. A woman discovers that her daughter has gone missing after a sleepover.

Join Robert Peston for a late-night political magazine show featuring big interviews with the country's leading politicians, topical guests, and the best political gossip.
World-leading forensic scientist Dr Angela Gallop and her team reveal how they unpicked the clues that brought the killer of Rachel Nickell to justice.
